---
title: "Amsterdam Open Water Swim Meet Report"
---

This is a report on the feasibility of hosting a 5km open water swimming event through the canals of Amsterdam, based on the concerns raised by the municipality of Amsterdam.

**Key facts**

* What: 5km open water swim
* Where: canals of Amsterdam
* When: May 2024

**Contents of report**

1. [Feasibility of event based on water quality](water.ipynb)
1. [Proposed swim route and event time](route-and-time.ipynb)
1. Proposed location of event headquarters
1. [Energy requirements for event](sustainability.ipynb)
1. Accommodation requirements for tourists
